title: Entertainment Live: Mog returns on TV and other news - BBC News
summary: top gear producer 'to sue ' jeremy clarkson .
author judith kerr brings mog the cat back for tv advert .
dermot o'leary replaces sir terry wogan on children in need .
ticket sales for prince 's uk tour postponed .

documents.title: julia roberts meets julia roberts
text: cast your mind back some 15 years and you may recall comedian dave gorman going on a hunt to find and meet other people also called dave gorman .
with julia roberts booked to appear on his show , jimmy kimmel thought he 'd try and find nine other women who share her name to appear on his programme .
it turns out if you 're called julia roberts , you can easily make restaurant and hotel reservations - just expect them to be disappointed when you arrive

documents.title: ncis actress pauley perrette attacked
text: ncis actress pauley perrette is recovering after being attacked outside her hollywood home last night .
the star , who plays abby in the cbs crime drama , said she was punched repeatedly in the face by a man who told her he was going to kill her .
he eventually let her go and she collapsed on the pavement .
she also recounted how a man walking his dog did not help her .
`` i am shaken and traumatised , '' she wrote .
her written account of the attack ( with strong language )
los angeles police said a man has been arrested on sus of aggravated battery .
so , tonight was awful , life changing and i 'm only grateful to be alive .

documents.title: the one where friends replaced jennifer aniston and no one noticed
text: oh .
my .
gawd .
a friends superfan has spotted a heinous crime .
in season nine 's episode 15 - the one with the mugging - rachel is seen at the start of the episode with joey .
the camera then cuts away to monica but when it pans back , jennifer aniston has been replaced by a random woman who is n't even wearing the same clothes .
could you be any more outraged ?
read the full story .
author: Radio Times

documents.title: digital art comes of age
text: key artworks made using digital techniques over the last few years are going on show in a new exhibition at the lowry arts centre in salford .

they range from interactive projections ( like daniel rozin 's darwinian straw mirror , below ) to works that turn atmospheric readings into music and installations that repurpose information from twitter or visitors ' mobile phones .
curator lucy dusgate said :
it 's about the way in which artists are embracing technology , as they always have done .
digital has become another one of their materials .

jon thomson and alison craighead have two pieces in the show - corruption , made from frames taken from a corrupt video file ( top ) and stutterer ( below ) , which uses youtube clips to represent the human genome sequence .
the exhibition , titled right here right now , opens tomorrow and runs until 28 february .

documents.title: v & a show a lot of pants
text: visitors to the victoria and albert museum in london next year will be treated to an exhibition on the history of underwear .
more than 200 examples of corsets , boxer shorts , bras , hosiery and lingerie will be on show , including a pair of long cotton drawers worn by queen victoria 's mother .
oo-er missus .
the museum tweeted a of a shocking pink corset to announce the exhibit .
# vamundressed will be our 2016 spring fashion exhibition !

documents.title: french loses bet with saunders over ab fab film
text: jennifer saunders won a bet with comedy partner dawn french over whether she could finish the absolutely fabulous film script - with just five minutes to spare .
french had stood to win £ 100,000 from if saunders did not finish the screenplay by the end of 2014 , french has revealed .
saunders was first reported to have been working on the script in 2011 .

`` i knew that writing the ab fab film that she was never going to do it , because she was supposed to have done it for eight years , '' french told alan carr 's chatty man on channel 4 , to be screened tonight .
`` this was a one-way bet .
she can give me £ 100,000 or the ab fab script .
we shook on it . ''
french was convinced she would win because she thought saunders was distracted with other pursuits as the months went on .
`` it was getting later and later in the year and i said to her , 'jen , i am honestly going to take your money ' . ''
but saunders assured her she would have the screenplay by the end of the year .
`` i was away in mexico on new year and 11.55pm there was a ping on my husband 's email , and there it was .
she got it in just in time . ''

documents.title: tangerine dreams
text: micro-budget comedy drama tangerine , the story of two transgender prostitutes in los angeles , is remarkable not just because it shows a side of hollywood rarely portrayed in the cinema - but because the whole film was shot on iphones .
we spoke to the director about how he filmed the movie and he also gave us his top tips for filming on a phone .

documents.title: lemmy 's tribute to motorhead drummer
text: motorhead frontman lemmy has paid tribute to drummer phil `` philthy animal '' taylor , whose death was announced yesterday .
taylor played in the metal band for 14 years .
he was 61 .
lemmy said :
i 'm feeling very sad at the moment , in fact devastated , because one of my best friends died yesterday .
i miss him already .
his name was phil taylor , or filthy animal , and he was our drummer twice in our career .
we 're still going , we 're still going strong , it 's just first wurzel and now filthy , it 's a shame , man .
i think this rock n roll business might be bad for the human life .
oh well .
wurzel was one of the band 's guitarists , who died four years ago .

documents.title: shia labeouf watching shia labeouf in gifs
text: if you 've been following our live page over the past few days , you 'll be aware we 've been following shia labeouf 's project to watch all his movies consecutively in reverse chronological order .
he 's completed the `` performance '' now , which was continuously live streamed online .
eagle-eyed viewers took the opportunity to capture some of the emotional rollercoaster the actor experienced , turning them into gifs for the world to enjoy .
we particularly like shia gets the giggles , shia gives himself a round of applause and shia gets an itch .
author: Entertainment Weekly

documents.title: star wars room for rent
text: a huge star wars fan says he has spent about £ 150,000 on turning his home into a shrine to the sci-fi franchise .
dave oldbury 's house in southampton features toys , posters , books , action figures and life-size storm troopers .
he is now offering other star wars fans the chance to stay for £ 35 per night .
you must adhere to dave 's house rules though :

documents.title: life - according to ethan hawke
text: even the rich and famous have trouble with hard-hitting family conversations about life and ethics - just ask ethan hawke .
the hollywood star has written a book to help start a dialogue with his children , and provide guidance for parents and children around the world .
in rules for a knight , the four-time oscar nominee and father of four outlines 20 guidelines to living a better , and more principled , life .
he told the bbc 's jane o'brien about his frustrations that parents today teach their kids about sex but not ethics .

documents.title: uk tv directors 'lack diversity '
text: a `` shocking '' report has revealed that only 1.5 % of uk television is made by directors of black , asian and minority ethnic ( bame ) origin .
the
diversity chair menhaj huda said the report showed working in television `` is inaccessible for far too many '' .

documents.title: christmas downton abbey plot revealed
text: itv has revealed details of the christmas edition of downton abbey - which will have fans weeping , given that it will be the final ever episode of the period drama .

miranda star patricia hodge ( above ) will be joining the cast as bertie pelham 's mother , while lily james , matt barber and peter egan will return as lady rose and atticus aldridge , and lady rose 's father , shrimpie .
itv also teased the following plot details :
mary endeavours to build bridges with her sister while edith 's secret continues to pose a threat , despite having nothing left to lose .
as henry settles into the role of husband and stepfather , finding his place at downton proves more difficult .
below stairs , carson faces some personal challenges , which prove that even he is not invulnerable to change .

the last ever episode offers all the love and loss , happiness and heartbreak of downton abbey , and as the family and servants prepare to welcome 1926 , they celebrate an unforgettable new year 's eve together at the great house .

documents.title: best plaice for chip shop musical
text: bolton 's two greatest institutions are joining forces at last .
first , the octagon theatre , home of some of the finest drama in the land .
second , the olympus fish and chip restaurant , which is notable mainly for its resident pianist .
now , the octagon ( in conjunction with freedom studios ) have announced plans to stage a show titled # chipshopthemusical in the restaurant .
about a teenager who gets a job in the chippy and her disillusioned , middle-aged boss , the show will take place next may and the £ 18 ticket price includes a fish supper .
the show forms part of the octagon 's new season .
( the other shows take place in the actual theatre . )
find out more

documents.title: top gear producer 'to sue ' clarkson
text: the producer who was punched by jeremy clarkson is understood to be suing the former top gear host and the bbc for racial discrimination .
court records show clarkson and the bbc attended a closed-door hearing with oisin tymon at a london employment tribunal on friday .
the case centres on `` verbal abuse '' that accompanied a physical attack during which clarkson struck tymon in march .
clarkson was dropped by the bbc following an internal inquiry .

documents.title: the hoff drops the hassel

it 's not entirely obvious whether the `` certificate of name change '' he holds up in his youtube announcement is totally official .

so many people think my life is all tv shows , musicals and hollywood .
but that 's not true .
i 've got my share of hassles too .
now i 'm taking matters into my own hands and making a change .
officially .
maybe one of the hassels sorry , hassles - he wants to get rid of is the low audience numbers for his stage musical last night a dj saved my life , which is currently touring the uk .
the sun newspaper today reported `` hundreds of empty seats '' under the headline : `` a hoff stage disaster . ''
big news today and a massive relief for me .
i hope everyone can understand it feels great !

documents.title: waterstones reveals book of the year list
text: thriller girl on the train and harper lee 's to kill a mockingbrid sequel go set a watchman have been shortlisted for 2015 's waterstones book of the year .
eight titles make up the list , which include four novels , three non-fiction titles and one children 's book .
the winning book will be announced on 1 december and receive the backing of the book chain in all its stores across the uk .
here 's the full shortlist :
author: The Bookseller

documents.title: new albums : one direction vs justin bieber
text: if the pop charts are less relevant than they used to be , then maybe there 's a new chart that is more important these days .
one direction 's album made in the am and justin bieber 's purpose are both out today - and # madeintheam and # purpose are doing battle to be the top twitter trend .
# madeintheam has the edge so far ( on our twitter at least ) .
come on beliebers .
have you listened to either yet ?
if so , send your 140-character reviews to @ twitterid and we 'll publish the best later .
one direction were also in the bbc radio 1 live lounge last night and did a cover of natalie imbruglia 's 1997 hit torn ( which itself was a cover of ednaswap ) .

documents.title: ricky wilson to leave the voice ?
text: kaiser chiefs frontman ricky wilson is to vacate his big red chair on tv talent show the voice after the next series ,
the show is leaving the bbc after next year 's series , and is rumoured to be going to itv .
ricky told the paper the forthcoming series is `` my last one anyway '' .
he said : `` i was going to bow out gracefully .
i do n't think itv would want me .
they would want to have a totally new show . ''
author: The Sun

documents.title: taylor swift shakes off copyright claim
text: earlier this month we told you about taylor swift being sued for $ 42m ( £ 27m ) for allegedly stealing the lyrics to her hit shake it off .
us r & b singer jesse braham claimed the star copied the words from a song he wrote in 2013 called haters gone hate .
but a us judge has thrown the case out , saying braham did n't have enough evidence to support his challenge .
showing she had a sense of humour , judge gail standish littered her ruling with the lyrics from some of swift 's hits .
at present , the court is not saying that braham can never , ever , ever get his case back in court .
but , for now , we have got problems , and the court is not sure braham can solve them .

as currently drafted , the complaint has a blank space - one that requires braham to do more than write his name braham may discover that mere pleading band-aids will not fix the bullet holes in his case .
at least for the moment , defendants have shaken off this lawsuit .
read more on this story .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: prince ticket sale postponed
text: the tickets for prince 's uk tour have not gone on sale this morning as planned .
ticket agent gigsandtours.com released a short statement .
no reason has been given .
we 'll let you know when we hear any more .
has the sale of the @ twitterid tickets been postponed because they prices are so extortionate ?
# prince
the onsale of prince - piano & a microphone tour has been postponed and will not be going ahead at 10am this morning .
@ twitterid thought it was too good to be true @ twitterid in bham : ) ) it 's not cancelled is it ?
@ twitterid
@ twitterid when are they going on sale ?
@ twitterid any reason or reschedule time ?
@ twitterid that was very last minute i hope it 's still going ahead
@ twitterid whens it gunna be
ah well rt @ twitterid onsale of prince - piano & a microphone tour has been postponed , will not be going ahead at 10am this morning .
got out of bed especially to buy prince tickets .
how could they .
gah .

documents.title: stars gear up for children in need
text: there 's loads going on around the country for children in need today .
martin freeman ( above ) , lewis hamilton and mel and sue have been added to the line-up for a special star wars sketch .

others taking part include bbc radio 1 dj scott mills , who was due to abseil down blackpool tower - but that has now been changed to the arcelormittal orbit in london 's olympic park because of high winds in the north-west .
a nervous-looking mills said :
the training i 've been doing over the last two weeks with the royal marines has kind of had to go out of the window because they use completely different equipment on the orbit .
meanwhile , the one show 's matt baker is on the final day of the rickshaw challenge , in which he 's covering 470 miles from land 's end to the east end .
full details of children in need - and how to donate - are on the website .
pudsey 's pals matt baker & erin digging deep for energy on the final day .
1.5 hours on and they are still smiling .
@ twitterid cherio !
@ twitterid just incredible !
nearly there .
superheroes !
@ twitterid fantatic !
have a great final day guys , you 're all heroes .
# eringo
@ twitterid almost there , keep smiling , you 're smashing it ! !
@ twitterid what an inspirational lot !
get texting and help them get that 2.1 million .

documents.title: mog the cat stars in sainsbury 's ad
text: author judith kerr 's much-loved children 's book character mog the cat is back , returning to star in the sainsbury 's christmas advert .
it 's 13 years since the last mog book came out .
now , as well as featuring in the ad , a new accompanying mog book and soft toy will be sold in the supermarket to raise money for save the children 's read on get on campaign .
the author said :

i have enjoyed illustrating mog again after so many years and am thrilled that this special christmas story will help raise funds for save the children and the important work they do for children 's literacy .
other slushy supermarket adverts are available .

documents.title: which ? highlights online ticket problems
text: it will not come as much surprise to most ticket-buyers - genuine fans are missing out on going to gigs and sporting events because of ticket resale sites , according to a report from consumer rights group which ?
it found tickets on get me in ! , seatwave , stubhub and viagogo before they were officially released or immediately afterwards .
which ?
also said some resale restrictions were being ignored .
you 'll be able to see exactly what they mean when tickets for prince 's piano & a microphone tour dates in glasgow , london and birmingham go on sale at 10:00 gmt .
tickets cost between £ 55-£ 175 - and that 's before people put them back online and try to resell them for a huge profit .
if you 're trying to get your hands on some , let us know how you get on .

documents.title: 'lucky ' daniel radcliffe gets hollywood star
text: actor daniel radcliffe was given his own star on hollywood 's walk of fame yesterday .
the 26-year-old vowed he would `` never stop feeling lucky to be here '' and thanked his parents , who had flown out to los angeles for the ceremony .
he told fans : `` growing up in england , when you hear the word hollywood , right after you the sign on the hill , you these stars .
it feels a very long way from when you grow up in fulham to this . ''

documents.title: dermot o'leary replaces sir terry on children in need
text: children in need wo n't be the same without sir terry wogan , who has been forced to pull out because he has back problems .
read what sir terry had to say .
but fear not - ( sir ) dermot o'leary has stepped into the breach and will join the telethon 's presenters .
the show starts on bbc one at 19:30 gmt .
good old dermot .
he said :
it 's a huge honour to be asked to step into sir terry 's shoes tonight ; he is one of my broadcasting heroes and has been a source of support for me down the years .

i 'd like to add my best wishes to sir terry for a speedy recovery , and i hope i do him justice and do my small part to make the night a success and make as much money as we can for disadvantaged children across the country .

documents.title: happy friday the 13th
text: good morning .
welcome to our rolling coverage of all friday 's entertainment and arts news .
and there 's lots going on - today is children in need day on the bbc , tickets for prince 's uk piano shows go on sale , and one direction and justin bieber 's new albums are out .
if you have views on those things or anything else then drop us a line on
and if you missed what happened yesterday ,
author: Ian Youngs
Entertainment reporter
